name: Walky Drawy
description:
A game by Sophia Clarke and Andre McGrail for Global Game Jam 2018

Send a message for a friend to decode, and receive one in return.

How to play:
1) Draw a message on the LCD screen
2) Press the Send button (bottom right)
3) Complete the platformer (press Space to jump) to send your message
4) Decode the message you received from your friend

GGJ Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/walky-drawy

Special thanks to Ming Wai for providing cats
